title: Looking for some chill players
body:
Heya

Just hoping to find some casual player, don't care about rank or skill. 
Just want people to have fun and mess with, if you wanna do ranked
we could try  once we get the hang of each others play style.
 I normally sup however I'll play any roll with a team. 

I have discord #9340
Add me on league or discord or even comment.
^^
